channel.title: Camelot - Bring back the good days of private server's
channel.description:
[ul][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/314dnnt.jpg[/img]
Camelot Is a 317 loading 474 that is based of PI. I will be rewriting most skills and other content that is included in PI. We aim to bring back the old days of RuneScape Private Server's before all these 718's and 317 loading 602 server's.
[b]Combat:[/b] [list] [li]PvP fully complete[/li] [li]PvN fully complete[/li] [li]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [li]Equipment requirements[/li] [/list]
[b]Magic:[/b] [list] [li]Fully working modern spell book[/li] [li]Fully working ancient spell book[/li] [li]Fully working lunar spell book[/li] [li]Clipped[/li] [/list]
[b]Range:[/b] [list] [li]All bow's working[/li] [li]Clipped[/li] [/list]
[b]Prayer:[/b] [list] [li]All bones bury-able[/li] [li]Prayer pots restore correct prayer points[/li] [li]Every prayer working properly[/li] [/list]
[b]Mining:[/b] [list] [li]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li] [li]All ores can be mined[/li] [li]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li] [li]Prospecting[/li] [li]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [/list]
[b]Smithing[/b] [list] [li]Can smelt all bars[/li] [li]All bars can be forged into items[/li] [li]All equipment can be produced[/li] [li]Correct animations, interfaces, and objects used[/li] [/list]
[b]Fishing:[/b] [list] [li]All fish can be cought[/li] [li]Correct item requirements[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [/list]
[b]Cooking:[/b] [list] [li]All meat can be cooked[/li] [li]Correct animation and timing used[/li] [li]Burn rates[/li] [li]Can eat all meat's[/li] [/list]
[b]Woodcutting:[/b] [list] [li]All tree type's can be choped[/li] [/list]
[b]Firemaking:[/b] [list] [li]All logs light-able[/li] [li]Ashes[/li] [li]Clipped[/li] [/list]
[b]Crafting:[/b] [list] [li]Leather crafting[/li] [li]Gem cutting[/li] [li]Jewellry making[/li] [li]Spinning flax[/li] [/list]
[b]RuneCrafting[/b] [list] [li]All altars working[/li] [li]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li]Talismans "pull" to altars[/li] [/list]
[b]Fletching:[/b] [list] [li]All logs can be fletched[/li] [li]All bows&crossbows can be fletched[/li] [li]All bows&crossbows can be strung[/li] [/list]
[b]Thieving:[/b] [list] [li]Stalls[/li] [li]Npc's[/li] [/list]
[b]Slayer:[/b] [list] [li]Working slayer gem[/li] [li]Slayer shop[/li] [/list]
[b]Farming:[/b] [list] [li]Herbs[/li] [/list]
[b]Herblore:[/b] [list] [li]Potion making[/li] [/list]
[b]Quest:[/b] [list] [li]Lost City[/li] [li]Dragon Slayer[/li] [li]Monkey Madness[/li] [/list]
More to come...
[b] Mini games:[/b] [list][li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Fight caves[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Warriors guild[/li] [/list]
[b]Misc:[/b] [list] [li]Clipped Npc's[/li] [li]Clipped player following[/li] [li]Hiscores[/li] [/list] More to come...
[b]Media:[/b]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/impezo.png[/img]
More to come...
[b]Videos:[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uzqQNAkL8eY[/youtube]
[hr] [b]Update log:[/b][/ul] [code]* April 26, 2013 - Downloaded Cleaned PI by Jack - Made it load 474 data, maps, and npcs
* April 27, 2013 - Fixed Dark Bow spec - Started Lost City
* April 28, 2013 - Completed Lost City - Started Npc clipping - Started clipped player following
* April 30, 2013 - Started Monkey Madess
* May 1, 2013 - Added some 474 Npc attack & death emotes - Re-did teleports - Completed Npc clipping - Started Firemaking
* May 2, 2013 - Started the spell [Charge orb]
* May 4, 2013 - Fixed 2h and godsword specs along with the ss spec - Started Dragon Slayer - Started Fishing - Started Cooking - Started Gem Cutting - Completed Gem Cutting
* May 5, 2013 - Started Jewelry Making - Completed Jewelry Making - Started Leather Making - Completed Leather Making - Started Flax & whool spinning [/code]
[b]Credits:[/b] - PI - Me - Any tuts I may use
All feedback is wanted.

item.title: Camelot - Bring back the good days of private server's
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Will be adding more media tomorrow!

Updates:

[b]* May 4, 2013

  • Fixed 2h and godsword specs along with the ss spec
  • Started Dragon Slayer
  • Started Fishing
  • Started Cooking
  • Started Gem Cutting
  • Completed Gem Cutting
  • May 5, 2013
  • Started Jewelry Making
  • Completed Jewelry Making
  • Started Leather Making
  • Completed Leather Making
  • Started Flax & whool spinning [/b]

item.title: Camelot - Bring back the good days of private server's

item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[ul]

Camelot Is a 317 loading 474 that is based of PI. I will be rewriting most skills and other content that is included in PI.
We aim to bring back the old days of RuneScape Private Server’s before all these 718’s and 317 loading 602 server’s.

Combat:
[list]
[li]PvP fully complete[/li]
[li]PvN fully complete[/li]

[li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li]
[li]Equipment requirements[/li]
[/list]
